categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: An individual was the Human male Minister of Intelligence of the Sith Empire during the Cold War. He was immediately under the Dark Councilor and head of the Sphere of Imperial Intelligence Darth Jadus; later he served in the same position under Darth Zhorrid but at the end of the Hunt for the Eagle, he was considered compromised and was replaced by the former Keeper.
